26111.example_1: catūhākārehi adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me'ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa, pubb'ev'assa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmī'ti, bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitan'ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ.

68180.example_1: catūhākārehi adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me'ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa, pubb'ev'assa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmī'ti, bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitan'ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ.

27555.example_1: chah'ākārehi adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me'ti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa, pubb'ev'assa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmī'ti, bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitan'ti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ, vinidhāya khantiṃ, vinidhāya ruciṃ.

38892.meaning_1: does not trust; does not consider possible
38892.construction:
na + ava + kappe + ti
na + okappeti
38892.example_1: tīh'ākārehi diṭṭhe vematiko diṭṭhaṃ nokappeti, diṭṭhaṃ nassarati, diṭṭhaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti

35881.meaning_1: does not remember; does not recollect
35881.example_1: tīh'ākārehi diṭṭhe vematiko diṭṭhaṃ nokappeti, diṭṭhaṃ nassarati, diṭṭhaṃ pamuṭṭho hoti
35881.commentary: (VINa) nassaratī'ti asāriyamāno nassarati. yadā pana taṃ asukasmiṃ nāma bhante ṭhāne asukasmiṃ nāma kāle'ti sārenti tadā sarati.

25836.example_1: jāti nāma dve jātiyo, hīnā ca jāti ukkaṭṭhā ca jāti. hīnā nāma jāti, caṇḍālajāti, venajāti, nesādajāti, rathakārajāti, pukkusajāti. esā hīnā nāma jāti.

70353.meaning_1: caste of basket weavers; bamboo workers
70353.example_1: jāti nāma dve jātiyo, hīnā ca jāti ukkaṭṭhā ca jāti. hīnā nāma jāti, caṇḍālajāti, venajāti, nesādajāti, rathakārajāti, pukkusajāti. esā hīnā nāma jāti.

54608.meaning_1: caste of wainwrights; (comm) caste of tanners
54608.example_1: jāti nāma dve jātiyo, hīnā ca jāti ukkaṭṭhā ca jāti. hīnā nāma jāti, caṇḍālajāti, venajāti, nesādajāti, rathakārajāti, pukkusajāti. esā hīnā nāma jāti.

23388.example_1: esā hīnā nāma jāti. ukkaṭṭhā nāma jāti, khattiyajāti, brāhmaṇajāti. esā ukkaṭṭhā nāma jāti.

49048.example_1: esā hīnā nāma jāti. ukkaṭṭhā nāma jāti, khattiyajāti, brāhmaṇajāti. esā ukkaṭṭhā nāma jāti.

18472.example_1: hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ, avakaṇṇakaṃ, javakaṇṇakaṃ, dhaniṭṭhakaṃ, saviṭṭhakaṃ, kulavaḍḍhakaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ.

10231.meaning_1: despised; disdained; disrespected; looked down upon
10231.example_1: hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ, avakaṇṇakaṃ, javakaṇṇakaṃ, dhaniṭṭhakaṃ, saviṭṭhakaṃ, kulavaḍḍhakaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ.

23002.example_1: hīnaṃ nāma kammaṃ, koṭṭhakakammaṃ, pupphachaḍḍakakammaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma kammaṃ.

46790.meaning_1: rubbish removal; janitorial work; (comm) toilet cleaner
46790.example_1: hīnaṃ nāma kammaṃ, koṭṭhakakammaṃ, pupphachaḍḍakakammaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma kammaṃ.

36008.example_1: sippaṃ nāma dve sippāni, hīnañ'ca sippaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca sippaṃ. hīnaṃ nāma sippaṃ, naḷakārasippaṃ, kumbhakārasippaṃ, pesakārasippaṃ, cammakārasippaṃ, nahāpitasippaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ.

22447.example_1: sippaṃ nāma dve sippāni, hīnañ'ca sippaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca sippaṃ. hīnaṃ nāma sippaṃ, naḷakārasippaṃ, kumbhakārasippaṃ, pesakārasippaṃ, cammakārasippaṃ, nahāpitasippaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ.

47327.example_1: hīnaṃ nāma sippaṃ, naḷakārasippaṃ, kumbhakārasippaṃ, pesakārasippaṃ, cammakārasippaṃ, nahāpitasippaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ.

26241.example_1: hīnaṃ nāma sippaṃ, naḷakārasippaṃ, kumbhakārasippaṃ, pesakārasippaṃ, cammakārasippaṃ, nahāpitasippaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ.

35980.meaning_1: skill of being a bathing attendant
35980.example_1: hīnaṃ nāma sippaṃ, naḷakārasippaṃ, kumbhakārasippaṃ, pesakārasippaṃ, cammakārasippaṃ, nahāpitasippaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ.

2156.example_1: liṅgaṃ nāma dve liṅgāni, hīnañ'ca liṅgaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca liṅgaṃ. hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, atidīghaṃ, atirassaṃ, atikaṇhaṃ, accodātaṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, nātidīghaṃ, nātirassaṃ, nātikaṇhaṃ, nāccodātaṃ.

2267.example_1: liṅgaṃ nāma dve liṅgāni, hīnañ'ca liṅgaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca liṅgaṃ. hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, atidīghaṃ, atirassaṃ, atikaṇhaṃ, accodātaṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, nātidīghaṃ, nātirassaṃ, nātikaṇhaṃ, nāccodātaṃ.

2042.example_1: liṅgaṃ nāma dve liṅgāni, hīnañ'ca liṅgaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca liṅgaṃ. hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, atidīghaṃ, atirassaṃ, atikaṇhaṃ, accodātaṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, nātidīghaṃ, nātirassaṃ, nātikaṇhaṃ, nāccodātaṃ.

1021.example_1: liṅgaṃ nāma dve liṅgāni, hīnañ'ca liṅgaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca liṅgaṃ. hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, atidīghaṃ, atirassaṃ, atikaṇhaṃ, accodātaṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, nātidīghaṃ, nātirassaṃ, nātikaṇhaṃ, nāccodātaṃ.

36153.meaning_1: not too dark; not too black
36153.example_1: hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, atidīghaṃ, atirassaṃ, atikaṇhaṃ, accodātaṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ, nātidīghaṃ, nātirassaṃ, nātikaṇhaṃ, nāccodātaṃ.

53451.meaning_1: adding the syllable -ya to a name; considered derogatory
53451.example_1: hīno nāma akkoso, oṭṭho'si, meṇḍo'si, goṇo'si, gadrabho'si, tiracchānagato'si, nerayiko'si, n'atthi tuyhaṃ sugati, duggati y'eva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā'ti, yakārena vā bhakārena vā, kāṭakoṭacikāya vā, eso hīno nāma akkoso.
53451.commentary: (VINa) yakārena vā bhakārena vā'ti yakārabhakāre yojetvā yo akkoso.

23875.meaning_1: wanting to abuse; wishing to insult
23875.example_1: upasampanno upasampannaṃ khuṃsetu'kāmo vambhetu'kāmo maṅkukattu'kāmo hīnena hīnaṃ vadeti, caṇḍālaṃ venaṃ nesādaṃ rathakāraṃ pukkusaṃ, caṇḍālo'si, veno'si, nesādo'si, rathakāro'si, pukkuso'sī'ti bhaṇati, āpatti vācāya, vācāya pācittiyassa.
23875.commentary: (VINa) khuṃsetu'kāmo vambhetu'kāmo maṅkukattu'kāmo'ti akkositu'kāmo padhaṃsitu'kāmo garahitu'kāmo nittejaṃ kattu'kāmo'ti attho.

66304.meaning_1: wanting to disparage; wishing to bring down
66304.example_1: upasampanno upasampannaṃ khuṃsetu'kāmo vambhetu'kāmo maṅkukattu'kāmo hīnena hīnaṃ vadeti, caṇḍālaṃ venaṃ nesādaṃ rathakāraṃ pukkusaṃ, caṇḍālo'si, veno'si, nesādo'si, rathakāro'si, pukkuso'sī'ti bhaṇati, āpatti vācāya, vācāya pācittiyassa.
66304.commentary: (VINa) khuṃsetu'kāmo vambhetu'kāmo maṅkukattu'kāmo'ti akkositu'kāmo padhaṃsitu'kāmo garahitu'kāmo nittejaṃ kattu'kāmo'ti attho.

32166.meaning_1: wish of joking; desire to have fun
32166.example_1: upasampanno upasampannaṃ na khuṃsetu'kāmo na vambhetu'kāmo na maṅkukattu'kāmo, davakamyatā hīnena hīnaṃ vadeti, caṇḍālaṃ venaṃ nesādaṃ rathakāraṃ pukkusaṃ, caṇḍālo'si, veno'si, nesādo'si, rathakāro'si, pukkuso'sī'ti bhaṇati, āpatti vācāya, vācāya dubbhāsitassa.

35696.meaning_1: not wishing to be loved; not wanting to be dear; not wishing to endear oneself
35696.commentary: (VINa) piyakamyassa vā'ti evaṃ ahaṃ etassa piyo bhavissāmī'ti attano piyabhāvaṃ patthayamānassa vā.

35770.meaning_1: not intending to cause discord; with no desire for dissension; not wishing to break apart
35770.commentary: (VINa) bhed'ādhippāyassa vā'ti evam'ayaṃ etena saddhiṃ bhijjissatī'ti parassa parena bhedaṃ icchantassa vā.

17307.grammar: card, comp, masc fem & nt pl
17307.example_1: anāpatti dvetisso rattiyo vasati, ūnakadvetisso rattiyo vasati, dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati, sabbacchanne, sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyena acchanne, yebhuyyena aparicchanne

46998.example_1: anāpatti dvetisso rattiyo vasati, ūnakadvetisso rattiyo vasati, dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā pur'āruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati, sabbacchanne, sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyena acchanne, yebhuyyena aparicchanne
46998.commentary: (KVt) tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasantassā'ti tatiyāya rattiyā aruṇato puretaram'eva nikkhamitvā aruṇaṃ bahi uṭṭhāpetvā catutthadivase atthaṅ'gate sūriye puna vasantassa.

58776.example_1: anāpatti dvetisso rattiyo vasati, ūnakadvetisso rattiyo vasati, dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati, sabbacchanne, sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyena acchanne, yebhuyyena aparicchanne

58774.example_1: anāpatti dvetisso rattiyo vasati, ūnakadvetisso rattiyo vasati, dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati, sabbacchanne, sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyena acchanne, yebhuyyena aparicchanne

1028.example_1: anāpatti dvetisso rattiyo vasati, ūnakadvetisso rattiyo vasati, dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati, sabbacchanne, sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyena acchanne, yebhuyyena aparicchanne

6347.example_1: anāpatti dvetisso rattiyo vasati, ūnakadvetisso rattiyo vasati, dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati, sabbacchanne, sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyena acchanne, yebhuyyena aparicchanne

19895.example_1: pañhaṃ puṭṭho'pi, pañhaṃ kathessāmī'ti hanuṃ saṃsodheti, so itarena, idaṃ nāma kathessasī'ti vutto ñātabhāvaṃ ñatvā, na etaṃ, aññaṃ kathessāmī'ti vadati. evaṃ parikappe na saṇṭhāti nāma.
19895.example_2: anāpatti viññunā purisaviggahena, chappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseti, ūnakachappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseti, uṭṭhahitvā puna nisīditvā deseti, mātugāmo uṭṭhahitvā puna nisīdati tasmiṃ deseti, aññassa mātugāmassa deseti, pañhaṃ pucchati, pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti, aññass'atthāya bhaṇantaṃ mātugāmo suṇāti

3821.meaning_1: ignoble mode of expression; untrue statement; communication without integrity
3821.example_1: sampajānamusāvādo nāma visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa vācā, girā, byappatho, vacībhedo, vācasikā viññatti, aṭṭha anariyavohārā, adiṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ me'ti, assutaṃ sutaṃ me'ti, amutaṃ mutaṃ me'ti
3821.commentary: (VINa) anariyavohārā'ti anariyānaṃ bālaputhujjanānaṃ vohārā (ANa) anariyavohārā'ti na ariyakathā sadosakathā. yāhi cetanāhi te vohāre voharanti, tāsaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.

8580.meaning_1: not sensed; not perceived; not known; (comm) not smelled, tasted or touched
8580.example_1: iti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgato… mutvā motabbaṃ, mutaṃ na maññati, amutaṃ na maññati, motabbaṃ na maññati, motāraṃ na maññati
8580.example_2: disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo, na tuyhaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ asutaṃ amutaṃ, atho aviññātaṃ kiñcanam'atthi loke, ācikkha dhammaṃ yam'ahaṃ vijaññaṃ, jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ.
8580.commentary: (VIN 2.5.1.1) amutaṃ nāma na ghānena ghāyitaṃ, na jivhāya sāyitaṃ, na kāyena phuṭṭhaṃ.
8580.comment: actually Bhante in VIB the same definition as in commentary. VIN2.5.1.1 musāvādasikkhāpadaṃ

11883.meaning_1: with a limit on offences; limited to transgressions
11883.example_1: atthi bhikkhusammuti āpattipariyantā, na kulapariyantā. atthi bhikkhusammuti kulapariyantā, na āpattipariyantā, atthi bhikkhusammuti āpattipariyantā ca kulapariyantā ca, atthi bhikkhusammuti n'eva āpattipariyantā na kulapariyantā.
11883.commentary: (VIN 2.5.9) āpattipariyantā nāma āpattiyo pariggahitāyo honti, ettakāhi āpattīhi ārocetabbo'ti.

22550.meaning_1: with a limit on families; limited to households
22550.example_1: atthi bhikkhusammuti āpattipariyantā, na kulapariyantā. atthi bhikkhusammuti kulapariyantā, na āpattipariyantā, atthi bhikkhusammuti āpattipariyantā ca kulapariyantā ca, atthi bhikkhusammuti n'eva āpattipariyantā na kulapariyantā.
22550.commentary: (VIN 2.5.9) kulapariyantā nāma kulāni pariggahitāni honti, ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbo'ti.

55401.example_1: ropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṃ na kathetu'kāmo taṃ na ugghāṭetu'kāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ viheseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

57034.example_1: anāpatti ajānanto pucchati, gilāno vā na katheti, saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī'ti na katheti, saṅghabhedo vā saṅgharāji vā bhavissatī'ti na katheti, adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṃ karissatī'ti na katheti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
57034.commentary: (VINa) evam'pi kho upāli saṅgharāji hoti, no ca saṅghabhedo'ti ettāvatā hi saṅgharājimattam'eva hoti, na tāva saṅghabhedo, anupubbena pana ayaṃ saṅgharāji vaḍḍhamānā saṅghabhedāya saṃvattatī'ti attho.

3055.example_1: anāpatti ajānanto pucchati, gilāno vā na katheti, saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī'ti na katheti, saṅghabhedo vā saṅgharāji vā bhavissatī'ti na katheti, adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṃ karissatī'ti na katheti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

65522.example_1: bhedāya parakkameyyāti, kathaṃ ime nānā assu, vinā assu, vaggā assū'ti pakkhaṃ pariyesati, gaṇaṃ bandhati.
65522.example_2: chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāy'āsanā pakkameyyā'ti kathaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ kuppaṃ assa vaggaṃ assa na kareyyā'ti gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. parisāya hatthapāsaṃ vijahantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa. vijahite āpatti pācittiyassa.
65522.comment: there is in anapati in VIN2.5.2.2  clearley meaning "incompleat" - should I instead add another meaning?

35355.meaning_1: not fit to participate in a legal action
35355.example_1: anāpatti ajānanto pucchati, gilāno vā na katheti, saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī'ti na katheti, saṅghabhedo vā saṅgharāji vā bhavissatī'ti na katheti, adhammena vā vaggena vā nakamm'ārahassa vā kammaṃ karissatī'ti na katheti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

34653.meaning_1: legally valid action; legitimate vinaya procedure
34653.meaning_2: legally valid act, procedure in accordance with Vinaya rules
34653.example_1: dhammakamme vematiko ujjhāpanake khiyyanake āpatti pācittiyassa. dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī ujjhāpanake khiyyanake āpatti pācittiyassa.

34655.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as a legally valid act; regarding (something) as a legitimate procedure

3059.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not a legally valid act; regarding (something) as not a legitimate procedure
3059.example_1: adhammakamme vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

15216.meaning_1: having caused to remove; having made take away; having caused to pack up
15216.example_1: anāpatti uddharitvā gacchati, uddharāpetvā gacchati, āpucchaṃ gacchati, otāpento gacchati, kenaci palibuddhaṃ hoti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

77848.example_1: anāpatti uddharitvā gacchati, uddharāpetvā gacchati, āpucchaṃ gacchati, otāpento gacchati, kenaci palibuddhaṃ hoti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

18520.meaning_1: drying; sunning; drying in the sun
18520.example_1: anāpatti uddharitvā gacchati, uddharāpetvā gacchati, āpucchaṃ gacchati, otāpento gacchati, kenaci palibuddhaṃ hoti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

59525.grammar: ind, adv, acc sg of sama
59525.meaning_1: in a similar manner; similarly; likewise
59525.example_1: yaṃ karomasi brahmuno, samaṃ devehi mārisa, tadajja tuyhaṃ kassāma, handa sāmaṃ karoma te.
59525.example_2: sīlagandhasamo gandho, kuto nāma bhavissati, yo samaṃ anuvāte ca, paṭivāte ca vāyati.
59525.commentary: (DNa) samaṃ devehī'ti devehi saddhiṃ, ito paṭṭhāya idāni amhākaṃ brahmuno namakkārakaraṇaṃ n'atthī'ti dasseti.

43444.example_1: katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso satisambojjh'aṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ

27088.meaning_1: wanting to swap; wishing to exchange; wanting to buy
27088.example_1: anāpatti ñātakānaṃ, pavāritānaṃ, aññass'atthāya, attano dhanena, mah'agghaṃ cetāpetu'kāmassa app'agghaṃ cetāpeti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
27088.commentary: (VINa) mah'agghaṃ cetāpetu'kāmassa app'agghaṃ cetāpetī'ti gahapatissa vīsati-agghanakaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpetu'kāmassa alaṃ mayhaṃ etena, das'agghanakaṃ vā aṭṭh'agghanakaṃ vā dehī'ti vadati anāpatti.

2296.grammar: ind, adv, comp, acc sg of atirekadirattatiratta
2296.meaning_1: for more than two or three days
2296.meaning_lit: for more than two or three nights
2296.construction:
atireka + diratta + tiratta + aṃ
atirekadirattatiratta + aṃ
2296.comment: since uttaridirattatirattaṃ is ind - this one should be also
